item.title: Welcome to the Eclipse Ditto project site
item.description:
A warm welcome, dear visitor, to our new project site.

The initial contribution of the Ditto codebase was one month ago and we did show the Digital twins a little on EclipseCon Europe in Ludwigsburg.
Meanwhile we worked on setting up the project site and documentation which we have now finished from the technical side.

The HTTP API Documentation is already complete and describes both of our API versions 1 and 2.

Next we focus on releasing a first Milestone 0.1.0M1 including images on Docker Hub so that you can try out Eclipse Ditto more easily without building it first.

We are looking forward to any feedback you have via our Feedback channels.

â€“
The Eclipse Ditto team
